content: peaks tank top en ©anna erlandsson 2018 hookedbyanna com peaks crochet tank top this simple yet stylish if i may say so myself ha tank top is a quick and easy make using only basic crochet stitches us crochet terms and any cotton based sport or dk weight yarn i m offering this pattern free in return i d love if you would show your finished tops on instagram tagging me @hooked_by_anna / #hooked_by_anna or link up your ravelry project page thanks i used a lovely hemp-cotton-modal rayon mix from danish brand onion knit a premium yarn perfectly suited to all kinds of summer projects it does come with a premium price tag so you may be glad to know that any cotton yarn e g scheepjes s catona paton s grace drops safran phildar s phil coton 3 schachenmayr s catania rowan s cotton glace will do the job i used a relatively large hook for a sport weight yarn it is perfectly possible to get gauge using a dk weight yarn and similar or smaller size hook scheepjes s linen soft would work very well too for example… the top consists of a front and a back panel worked from the bottom up and then stitched together at the sides finally some finishing edging stitches and straps are crocheted sizing this pattern comes in two sizes s/m top cirumference c 86 cm/ 34 inches will fit chest up to about 95 cm / 37 inches as the top has a lot of stretch 1 peaks tank top en ©anna erlandsson 2018 hookedbyanna com l top circumference c 106 cm/ 42 inches will fit chest up to 116 cm / 45 inches instructions for size l are in brackets in blue like this why such a big difference between sizes and why aren t there more sizes you may ask… well it s to do with those neat diagonal lines meeting in the middle and the resulting rather long pattern repeat if you do want your top another size i d recommend experimenting with a different weight yarn and/or different hook size to get a larger or smaller gauge and hence size for instance crocheting the s/m size with a worsted weight yarn and 5 mm hook may give you something that is in-between my two sizes above materials 350m 383 yards of sport or dk weight yarn exact yarn weight doesn t really matter as long as you meet gauge for size s/m c 500m 547 yards for size l i used onion knit s hemp+cotton+modal in 402 dark blue read more about yarn choice above 3 5 mm crochet hook or hook needed to get gauge and the usual
